post.body: Congrats on the HARO win!
Great avatar!
Congrats! 5 kids for real? That's varsity!
Congrats on NPR!! Whoo hoo.
NICE! RT'ing Liz' Blip http://blip.fm/~15nzq
Saw your booth at the Mass Woman's Conference -- hope it went for you
Next Generation needs your help with backup care; they really need help. Just had 2nd nightmare experience w their service
I liked your blog calling out the opportunity for the "networked mindset" and Obama's call to action. http://c21org.typepad.com/
Employer fear of personal brands sounds like rewind on fear of LinkedIn a yr or so ago. Networks and PB's are good for business.
So great to have Twitter to connect with you. Thanks for finding me. It was SO GREAT to hang with you last night.
@lindseypollak: Looks like Joanne G Berk and I will work together again - this time on an HBR book. :)
Congrats on the ABC Campus gig too! Will I see you in Belize please?
2nd employee-led SM event happening 2day at EMC -- sharing of photos representing life outside of work. AMAZING Pics + Global Participation!
Just had dinner w 3 girlfriends I met at age 4, 5, and 12, respectively. We're 42 now. Everyone is happy, well and liking red wine tonight!
Just put together a devilish yankee swap gift for ladies night out - must try to take it home myself ;)
just leaving work; missing girls night out. duh
A great read on ways to green-friendly present wrapping, without all the wasted paper. http://tinyurl.com/5ohdd7.
B/U nanny srvc sent someone knowing little english, no car, asked to sleep over, needed help to + on train; son petrified. Fun.
RT @michaelgass: The Best Of Chris Brogan 2008| http://tinyurl.com/5v5adn Always good reminders for bloggers
Heading to Martha's Vineyard for a Big Chill weekend.
Heading to husband's restaurant 4 drinks in the tavern. Join me? 1790 in westboro
thanks @downtownwoman for the great night out.
Employee Engagement ex: Ask ee's to share photo representing self outside o work.Result? 200+ photos, fr 25+ countries, 3500 views in 48 hrs
Tweeples: Sending U a green Xmas greeting and a peek at my family (click the forward buttons on the snow globe): http://tinyurl.com/4t8mnj
